<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>In advance of selected date with schedule</description>
        <name>Value Date</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//var startDateMs = calculator.startDateTime.getNumericValue();
var valueDate = '2022-08-11';
valueDate = valueDate + " 04:30:00"; // end of KL time in UTC format
gs.print("valueDate: " + valueDate); // shows end of day time for value date

var dueDate4daysago;
var dueDate = new GlideDateTime(valueDate); // set due date to value date

var output;
var ctr = 0; // count number of working days reduced from value date
//while (ctr < 4) {
    gs.print('dueDate: ' + dueDate);
    output = checkSchedule(dueDate); // check if duedate is a working day
    gs.print("output: " + output);
    if (output)
        ctr++; // increment counter by 1 if day is a working day

    dueDate.addDays(-1);

//}

// output = checkSchedule(dueDate);
gs.print("final due date: " + dueDate);

function checkSchedule(checkdate) {
    gs.print("checkdate.getDisplayValue(): " + checkdate.getDisplayValue());
    var glide = new GlideRecord('cmn_schedule');
    glide.addQuery('name', 'TEST - Schedule');
    glide.query();
    if (glide.next()) {
        var sched = new GlideSchedule(glide.sys_id);
        var date = new GlideDate();
        date.setDisplayValue(checkdate.getDisplayValue());
        if (sched.isInSchedule(date)) {
            gs.print("IN schedule: " + date);
            return true;
        } else {
            gs.print("OUT of schedule: " + date);
            return false;
        }
    }
}]]></script>
